title: I'm a jungler, and I tend to ignore bot lane
body:
yup. i tend to focus on carry lanes more, or easy gank lanes. playing xin, I get cucked by exaust, cc, and mobility. bot lane tends to have too many tools to escape, so i tend to just abuse top and mid and their jungler and hope its enough.

1/10 how much do you hate me? :^) I am the reason your bot lane feeds. I am the reason their vayne is 20/0 :^)
